instructions.step1: Replace YOUR_GEMINI_API_KEY_HERE with your actual Gemini API key
instructions.step2: Save this file to your desktop or a secure location
instructions.step3: In the Marine Platform, go to Settings > Data Management > Import API Key
instructions.step4: Select this file to automatically configure your API key
instructions.getApiKey: Get your API key from: https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey
